    static Curve2 Curve2.ellipse​(float aspect, Curve2 target)
    Creates a curve which approximates an ellipse; currently there is support only for 4 knot ellipses.

    Flips the curve on the x axis, then reverses the curve.
    Curve2 Curve2.flipY()
    Flips the curve on the y axis, then reverses the curve.

    Converts a set of points on a Catmull-Rom spline to a Bezier curve.

    Creates a curve from a face in a mesh.

    Creates a curve from a series of points.
    Curve2 CurveEntity2.get​(int i)
    Gets a curve from this curve entity.
    static Curve2 Curve2.infinity​(Curve2 target)
    Creates a curve that approximates Bernoulli's lemniscate, which resembles an infinity loop (with equally proportioned lobes).

    The curve is set as a closed loop; however, it intersects itself, and so may lead to rendering issues when used with a fill.
    Curve2 Curve2.insert​(int i, Knot2 knot)
    Inserts a knot at a given index.
    Curve2 Curve2.insertAll​(int i, Knot2... kn)
    Inserts a list of knots at a given index.
    Curve2 Curve2.insertAll​(int i, java.util.Collection<Knot2> kn)
    Inserts a collection of knots at a given index.
    static Curve2 Curve2.line​(Vec2 origin, Vec2 dest, Curve2 target)
    Creates a curve that forms a line with an origin and destination.
    Curve2 Curve2.prepend​(Knot2 knot)
    Prepend a knot to the curve's list of knots.
    Curve2 Curve2.prependAll​(Knot2... kn)
    Prepend an array of knots to the curve's list of knots.
    Curve2 Curve2.prependAll​(java.util.Collection<Knot2> kn)

    Sets a target curve to a rectangle.
    Curve2 Curve2.reframe​(Transform2 tr)
    Centers the curve about the origin, (0.0, 0.0), and rescales it to the range [-0.5, 0.5] .
    Curve2 Curve2.relocateKnot​(int i, Vec2 v)
    Relocates a knot at a given index to a coordinate.
    Curve2 CurveEntity2.removeAt​(int i)
    Removes a curve at a given index.
    Curve2 Curve2.resetToDefault()
    Resets the curve, leaving two default knots.
    Curve2 Curve2.reverse()
    Reverses the curve.
    Curve2 Curve2.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates all knots in the curve by an angle in radians around the z axis.
    static Curve2 Curve2.sampleSegment​(int i, Curve2 source, Curve2 target)
    Samples a segment from a source curve into a target.
    Curve2 Curve2.scale​(float scale)
    Scales all knots in the curve by a scalar.
    Curve2 Curve2.scale​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales all knots in the curve by a vector.
    Curve2 Curve2.set​(Curve2 source)
    Sets this curve to a copy of the source.
    static Curve2 Curve2.smoothHandles​(Curve2 target)
    Adjusts knot handles so as to create a smooth, continuous curve.
    static Curve2 Curve2.straightenHandles​(Curve2 target)
    Adjusts knot handles so as to create straight line segments.
    Curve2 Curve2.toOrigin​(Transform2 tr)
    Centers the curve about the origin, (0.0, 0.0), by calculating its dimensions then subtracting the center point.
    Curve2 Curve2.transform​(Mat3 m)
    Transforms all knots in the curve by a matrix.
    Curve2 Curve2.transform​(Transform2 tr)
    Transforms all coordinates in the curve permanently by a transform.

    Not to be confused with the temporary transformations applied by a curve entity's transform to the meshes contained within the entity.

    Useful when consolidating multiple curve entities into one curve entity.
    Curve2 Curve2.translate​(Vec2 v)
    Translates all knots in the curve by a vector.
